verbs.description: The Pentagon [V: has] told Congress it estimates that nearly 500 civilians were killed as a result of US military actions in the first year of the Trump administration .
[ARG0: The Pentagon] has [V: told] [ARG2: Congress] [ARG1: it estimates that nearly 500 civilians were killed as a result of US military actions in the first year of the Trump administration] .
The Pentagon has told Congress [ARG0: it] [V: estimates] [ARG1: that nearly 500 civilians were killed as a result of US military actions in the first year of the Trump administration] .
The Pentagon has told Congress it estimates that nearly 500 civilians [V: were] killed as a result of US military actions in the first year of the Trump administration .

The Pentagon has told Congress it estimates that [ARG1: nearly 500 civilians] were [V: killed] [ARGM-CAU: as a result of US military actions] [ARGM-TMP: in the] [ARGM-CAU: first year of the Trump administration] .
